entry.title: RUMOR CONFIRMED ✅
entry.summary:
RUMOR CONFIRMED ✅
DeFi Pulse: UNVERIFIED RUMOR: Gary Gensler was going to give IEX and FTX "no-action relief" (meaning a letter saying if you do X in this way, while technically against our rules, we won't come after you).

entry.title: Re h/t @lund_dane
entry.summary: Re h/t @lund_dane Dane Lund: It is worth noting, the ties between FTX and the SEC go beyond in-person meetings. The general counsel of FTX US had served as lead counsel to Chairman Gensler at the CFTC. By all accounts, he is a standup and excellent attorney. The point is that the SEC was pretty close.
